entry.title: Christmas Post
entry.content:
On the eve of Christmas I thought of wtriting a script that can find all the best Christmas jokes and receipies available on the web. It will be fun to automate such a script which I can also use in future as well. This will involve writing a script in Ruby, Mechanize, Nokogiri and finding the matches for our search criteria and showing it to the screen.

As a further work we can also use to save the output to a mongo db and if possible show it as a webpage.
